column1: Here, we demonstrate that aglycon of rhizochalin ( AglRhz) from the Rhizochalina incrustata induces AMP - activated protein kinase ( AMPK) phosphorylation, and thereby inhibits mammalian target of rapamycin ( mTOR) - p70S6 kinase - extracellular signal - regulated kinase ( ERK) signaling and activator protein 1 ( AP - 1) activity via phosphorylation of Raptor in HT - 29 cells.
